title: @Riot, please read this when you have the time.
body:
I never came to this board because it's a little uncomfortable for my eyes (the color scheme) and because it's inconvenient and cluttered. I very much prefer a coherent setup, not reddit.

I know I'm not the only person that feels this way. I know it won't make an impact on your elisions whatsoever, but I don't think I'll be signing onto the forums anymore. Maybe if you get rid of the clutter and make it easier to navigate I'll come back.

I wasn't really a GD person per-say, but the feel and look of the old boards was much cleaner (for the user, not counting the search engine) and easier to grasp.

I'll check later to see if any Riot person has responded on the likelihood of those changes. If they aren't likely, then I think I'll just play the game and stop visiting the website.

replies.body: Dude they've been working on this change for over a year, they aren't going to up and change the format. Sorry to say that we'll just have to learn to live with it.

I'm aware of that, I'm not ignorant. I said this before when this format was still in beta, numerous times. 

You can choose to live with it, but I'm just not going to give myself the headache of caring. I'll stick to just playing.
Search for "Custom Boards Theme" and you'll find two people who have made custom skins for the Boards, that are brighter :)
